title: How to use a pool vacuum - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s go through what steps you have to follow to correctly set up your pool vacuum  As said here, the first step for you is attaching the head of the vacuum to one of the telescopic pole’s ends. This step is required so that you will be able to move it around the pool.Take one end of the hose and attach it to the headLower the head gently into the pool, while you are holding it in your hand. Don’t forget to make sure that its other head is laying outside of the pool.Find where the filter skimmer is (usually it’s where the water starts flowing into the pool)Now it’s time to plug in the other hose end into the intake water nozzle.Switch it to “intake mode” and then carefully guide it by using the pole. At this point, you should already witness dirt being sucked in.Simply disconnect the filter and the hose when your job is done.
A little round cap at the side pool contains the pool skimmer. It looks like a 12 inch plastic manhole cover. Lift it and plug the vacuum hose in there.
